DOC.brief_summary: In patient biliodigestive anastomosis direct cholangiography ( ERC ) due change anatomy commonly possible . The aim study test feasibility perform direct cholangiography patient via double-balloon enteroscopy compare MR cholangiography .
DOC.brief_title: ERC Via Double-Balloon-Enteroscopy Patients With Biliodigestive Anastomosis
DOC.criteria: Biliodigestive anastomosis ; Suspicion biliary disorder Exclusion criterion doubleballoon enteroscopy MRcholangiography
